hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Jenkins Configuraitons Directory cd $JENKINS_HOME git init # Add general configurations, job configurations, and user content git add -- *.xml jobs/*/*.xml userContent/*
# only add user configurations if they exist if [ -d users ]; then user_configs=`ls users/*/config.xml`
if [ -n "$user_configs" ]; then git add $user_configs fi fi
# mark as deleted anything that's been, well, deleted to_remove=`git status | grep "deleted" | awk '{print $3}'`
if [ -n "$to_remove" ]; then git rm --ignore-unmatch $to_remove fi
git commit -m "Automated Jenkins commit"
#git remote add origin git@github.com:arvindpathare/jenkins_backup
git push https://arvindpathare:Sai@baba1234@github.com/arvindpathare/jenkins_backup.git
#git push -q -u origin master
